snippet: A court on Thursday sentenced 18 Hindus to life in prison for killing 23 Muslims in Gujarat State in 2002, during India’s worst sectarian violence in recent years.
abstract: Indian court sentences 18 Hindus to life in prison for killing 23 Muslims in Gujarat State in 2002 during the country's worst sectarian violence in recent years; the convicted men were part of a mob that set a house on fire and prevented the occupants from escaping during religious riots.
lead_paragraph: A court on Thursday sentenced 18 Hindus to life in prison for killing 23 Muslims in Gujarat State in 2002, during India’s worst sectarian violence in recent years.
